FibonacciSimpleActionServer
public class DefaultSimpleActionServer<T_ACTION_FEEDBACK extends Message,T_ACTION_GOAL extends Message,T_ACTION_RESULT extends Message,T_FEEDBACK extends Message,T_GOAL extends Message,T_RESULT extends Message>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ActionServerCallbacks<T_ACTION_FEEDBACK,T_ACTION_GOAL,T_ACTION_RESULT,T_FEEDBACK,T_GOAL,T_RESULT>, SimpleActionServer<T_ACTION_FEEDBACK,T_ACTION_GOAL,T_ACTION_RESULT,T_FEEDBACK,T_GOAL,T_RESULT>

An action server which simplifies much of the complexity of a full DefaultActionServer.

acceptNewGoal

public T_GOAL acceptNewGoal()
                                     throws RosException
The server accepts a new goal from the client.

Any current goal is canceled.
